Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Internship application project for 32 Bit Bilgisayar software company This is a class for game board (simply a chess board) for the game. Class includes some basic functions for board, like setter and getters, to ease operations while playing the game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameBoard()
      No parameter constructor Initializes a 8x8 (chess) board using 2D char array and fills all cells with default empty representation
      GameBoard(char def)
      Constructor with char parameter Initializes a 8x8 (chess) board using 2D char array and takes default character representation of empty board cell to fill all cells with

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPlaceable(char piece)
      Inserts new placeable piece to the placeables array
      void addPlaceable(char piece, java.lang.String definition)
      Inserts new placeable piece to the placeables array along with its definition
      char get(char col, int row)
      Getter for game board, reaches element using board location
      char get(int i, int j)
      Getter for gameboard, reaches element using index numbers
      void Legend()
      Toggle for legend display on board map returned from toString method
      boolean set(char col, int row, char input)
      Setter for game board, changes element using board location
      boolean set(int i, int j, char input)
      Setter for game board, changes element using index numbers
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString function override from class Object Converts the board to a simple string to print with help of StringBuilder
